questions_1.question: Identify the Internal evidences of #1 carbon seal leakage.
Options: Oil dripping from the forward edge of the carbon seal assembly.
Heavy wetting on the #1 bearing support plate.
Oil leakage from the aft flange of the carbon seal.
All the above symptoms may be combined with high oil consumption
questions_1.correctFeedback:
That's Correct!

You have chosen the correct option.
questions_1.InCorrectFeedback:
That's Incorrect!

You have chosen the wrong option. The valid answer is "Oil dripping from the forward edge of the carbon seal assembly, Heavy wetting on the #1 bearing support plate, Oil leakage from the aft flange of the carbon seal, All the above symptoms may be combined with high oil consumption. "
